TEXT: One surrounded by flames, NL and one who conceals the past.
NL This foul thing should be #r~destroyed.~

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some simplistic ritual. NL As you approach, they turn to you in unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, sickly looking hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sisters,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~ NL What a pathetic offer.
